function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tendency to apply digital strategies in contexts with higher GDP per capita or history of digital instrumentation","Impact":"Risk of digital inequality and exclusion of lower-income areas or less technologically advanced cities","Mitigation":"Investment in infrastructure and digital literacy programs for underprivileged areas, and promotion of technology diffusion to all areas","Technologies":"Digital infrastructure, internet access, communication technologies","People":"Lower-income areas, less technologically advanced cities","Owner":"Government, private sector, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Unilateral view of technology as the last solution for demands in cities","Impact":"Risk of overlooking non-technological solutions, leading to inefficient urban development","Mitigation":"Promotion of a multi-faceted approach to urban development, considering the social, economic, and environmental aspects alongside technological solutions","Technologies":"Integrated urban planning, sustainable development strategies","People":"Urban planners, policymakers, community leaders","Owner":"Urban planning organizations, policymakers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Evolution of digital tooling and crisis-induced learning raising awareness about the role of technology in the urban environment","Impact":"Risk of over-reliance on technology and neglect of community-driven governance and decision-making","Mitigation":"Promotion of community engagement, citizen participation, and inclusive governance models alongside technological advancements","Technologies":"Digital platforms for citizen engagement, community forums, participatory decision-making tools","People":"Urban communities, local governance bodies, community organizations","Owner":"Local government, community organizations, technology providers"}]}
